Detailed Description

Contains main() and the entry into simulation maos().

Function Documentation

void maos ( const PARMS_T *  parms  ) 

This is the routine that calls various functions to do the simulation.

maos() calls setup_aper(), setup_powfs(), and setup_recon() to set up the aperture (of type APER_T), wfs (of type POWFS_T), and reconstructor (of type RECON_T) structs and then hands control to sim(), which then stars the simulation. 

00039                                {    
00040     APER_T  * aper;
00041     POWFS_T * powfs;
00042     RECON_T * recon;
00043 
00044     aper  = setup_aper(parms);
00045     info2("After setup_aper:\t%.2f MiB\n",get_job_mem()/1024.);
00046     powfs = setup_powfs(parms, aper);
00047     info2("After setup_powfs:\t%.2f MiB\n",get_job_mem()/1024.);
00048     
00049     recon = setup_recon(parms, powfs, aper);
00050     info2("After setup_recon:\t%.2f MiB\n",get_job_mem()/1024.);
00051     /*
00052       Before entering real simulation, make sure to delete all variables that
00053       won't be used later on to save memory.
00054     */
00055     if(parms->dbg.evlol){
00056     sim_evlol(parms, powfs, aper, recon);
00057     }else{
00058     sim(parms, powfs, aper, recon);
00059     }
00060     /*Free all allocated memory in setup_* functions. So that we
00061       keep track of all the memory allocation.*/
00062     free_recon(parms, recon); recon=NULL;
00063     free_powfs(parms, powfs); powfs=NULL;
00064     free_aper(aper); powfs=NULL;
00065 #if USE_PTHREAD == 2
00066     if(parms->sim.nthread>1)
00067     thr_pool_destroy(default_pool);
00068 #endif
00069 }

Here is the call graph for this function:

int main ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
)

This is the standard entrance routine to the program.

It first calls setup_parms() to setup the simulation parameters and check for possible errors. It then waits for starting signal from the scheduler if in batch mode. Finally it hands the control to maos() to start the actual simulation.

Call maos with overriding *.conf files or embed the overriding parameters in the command line to override the default parameters, e.g.

maos base.conf save.setup=1 'powfs.phystep=[0 100 100]'

Any duplicate parameters will override the pervious specified value. The configure file nfiraos.conf will be loaded as the master .conf unless a -c switch is used with another .conf file. For scao simulations, call maos with -c switch and the right base .conf file.

maos -c scao_ngs.conf override.conf

for scao NGS simulations

maos -c scao_lgs.conf override.conf

for scao LGS simulations. With -c switch, nfiraos.conf will not be read, instead scao_ngs.conf or scao_lgs.conf are read as the master config file. Do not specify any parameter that are not understood by the code, otherwise maos will complain and exit to prevent accidental mistakes.

Generally you link the maos executable into a folder that is in your PATH evironment or into the folder where you run simulations.

Other optional parameters: 

   -d          do detach from console and not exit when logged out
   -s 2 -s 4   set seeds to [2 4]
   -n 4        launch 4 threads.
   -f          To disable job scheduler and force proceed
In detached mode, drawing is automatically disabled. 
00111                                {
00112 
00113     char*fn=mybasename(argv[0]);
00114     if(!strncmp(fn, "scheduler",9)){//launch the scheduler.
00115     scheduler();
00116     exit(0);
00117     }
00118     char *scmd=argv2str(argc,argv);
00119     strcpy(argv[0],fn);
00120     free(fn);
00121 
00122     ARG_T* arg=parse_args(argc,argv);
00123     /*In detach mode send to background and disable drawing*/
00124     if(arg->detach){
00125     disable_draw=1;//disable drawing.
00126     //info2("Sending to background\n");
00127     daemonize();
00128     fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", scmd);
00129     }
00130     info2("MAOS Version %s. ", PACKAGE_VERSION);
00131 #ifdef SVN_REV
00132     if(strlen(SVN_REV)>1 && strcmp(SVN_REV,"exported")){
00133     info2("Revision %s. ", SVN_REV);
00134     }
00135 #endif
00136     info2("Launched at %s in %s.\n",myasctime(),myhostname());
00137     info2("Compiled on %s %s by %s ", __DATE__, __TIME__, __VERSION__);
00138 #ifdef __OPTIMIZE__
00139     info2("with optimization.\n");
00140 #else
00141     info2("without optimization!!!\n");
00142 #endif
00143     //register signal handler
00144     register_signal_handler(maos_signal_handler);
00145   
00146 
00147     scheduler_start(scmd,arg->nthread,!arg->force);
00148     //setting up parameters before asking scheduler to check for any errors.
00149     PARMS_T * parms=setup_parms(arg);
00150     info2("After setup_parms:\t %.2f MiB\n",get_job_mem()/1024.);
00151     if(!lock_seeds(parms)){
00152     warning("There are no seed to run. Exit\n");
00153     maos_done(0);
00154     return 1;
00155     }
00156     if(!arg->force){
00157     /*
00158       Ask job scheduler for permission to proceed. If no CPUs are
00159       available, will block until ones are available.
00160       if arg->force==1, will run immediately.
00161     */
00162     info2("Waiting start signal from the scheduler ...\n");
00163     int count=0;
00164     while(scheduler_wait()&& count<60){
00165         /*Failed to wait. fall back to own checking.*/
00166         warning3("failed to get reply from scheduler. retry\n");
00167         sleep(10);
00168         count++;
00169         scheduler_start(scmd,arg->nthread,!arg->force);
00170     }
00171     if(count>=60){
00172         warning3("fall back to own checker\n");
00173         wait_cpu(arg->nthread);
00174     }
00175     }
00176     info2("\n*** Simulation started at %s in %s. ***\n\n",myasctime(),myhostname());
00177     free(scmd);
00178     free(arg->seeds);
00179     free(arg->dirout);
00180     free(arg->conf);
00181     free(arg);
00182     
00183 #if USE_PTHREAD == 2
00184     //Create thread pool.
00185     if(parms->sim.nthread>1)
00186     default_pool=thr_pool_create(1,parms->sim.nthread,3600,NULL);
00187 #endif
00188     dirsetup=stradd("setup",NULL);
00189     if(parms->save.setup){
00190     mymkdir("%s",dirsetup);
00191     addpath(dirsetup);
00192     }
00193     if(parms->sim.skysim){
00194     dirskysim=stradd("skysim",NULL);
00195     mymkdir("%s",dirskysim);
00196     }else{
00197     dirskysim=mystrdup(".");
00198     }
00199 
00200     /*Loads the main software*/
00201     maos(parms);
00202     maos_done(0);
00203     free_parms(parms);
00204     free(dirsetup);
00205     free(dirskysim);
00206     info2("Job finished at %s\t%.2f MiB\n",myasctime(),get_job_mem()/1024.);
00207     exit_success=1;//tell mem.c to print non-freed memory in debug mode.
00208     return 0;
00209 }
